descriptionHtml:

Get closer to god with this Bible App. Read, Listen and Share the Holy Bible using this completely free Bible App.

Stay motivated with a new verse everyday. Grow in your faith with devotionals.

The Bible is a collection of sacred texts or scriptures. Varying parts of the Bible are considered to be a product of divine inspiration and a record of the relationship between God and humans by Christians, Jews, Samaritans, and Rastafarians.

King James Version KJV

New American Bible, revised edition (Catholic)

● It is our nourishment.
● It helps us discover our next step.
● It is full of God's promises.
